output.name: wink
output.description: A cross-platform 3D graphics viewer built in Rust using winit and wgpu that runs natively on desktop and in web browsers via WebAssembly.

author.name: Petras Vestartas
author.contributionSummary: Original author and maintainer of Wink; implemented cross-platform 3D viewer using Rust and WASM
